title: bArO munisEtake
sahitya:
bArO munisEtake bhAvajanayya


caraNam 1    mAvanaLiyane bAro bhAvadanayane bAro mAvana maDadiya magaLa soseya gaNDa
    caraNam 2    attige maitunane bAro attigeya magaLa gaND matte mEle attigeya putriya muddADuta 
    caraNam 3    ambuja nayanane bAro AdimUlane bAro kambadindoDadu banda purandara viTTalayya
